purpose: Customizes i3wm with background monitoring and optimized compositing settings.
integration_points: Runs system monitor as desktop background
notes: This module extends the base i3wm configuration by importing it and adding a systemd user service that uses xwinwrap to display the 'bottom' system monitor as a full-screen background. It also configures picom compositor with performance-optimized settings, including GLX backend, vSync, and opacity rules for various applications. Dconf is enabled for GNOME integration. Reasoning: Provides a personalized i3wm experience with live system monitoring visible at all times, optimized for smooth performance on potentially resource-constrained systems like ARM devices. The picom settings prioritize efficiency over visual effects.
